sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { propTypes } from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Image' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' const Rating = ({value,text,color}) => { return (
=1 ?'fas fa-star' :value >= 0.5 ?'fas fa-star-half-alt' :'far fa-star' }> =2 ?'fas fa-star' :value >= 1.5 ?'fas fa-star-half-alt' :'far fa-star' }> =3 ?'fas fa-star' :value >= 2.5 ?'fas fa-star-half-alt' :'far fa-star' }> =4 ?'fas fa-star' :value >= 3.5 ?'fas fa-star-half-alt' :'far fa-star' }> =5 ?'fas fa-star' :value >= 4.5 ?'fas fa-star-half-alt' :'far fa-star' }> {text && text}
) } Rating.defaultProps= { color:'#f83825', } Rating.propTypes ={ value:PropTypes.number.isRequired, text:PropTypes.string.isRequired, color:PropTypes.string, } export default Rating
